question: Mufti Shab Salam
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to ask that was any symptoms were given about any of the Imamas (Hanifa (RH) or any other Imams In a Holy book or By Beloved Prohet (SAWW)? I have heard that In Zaboor their is that mentioned about Hanfia (RH).
ANSWER


Share:
We are not aware of any predictions of Imaam Abu Hanifa in the Zaboor.

However, Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) once indicated towards
Hadhrat Salman (RA) and said, 'If knowledge will be in Surayya (a distant
star), the people of Persia will go there and seek it.' Many Muhadditheen
are of the opinion that the prediction refers to Imaam Abu Hanifa (RA).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
